statements: SELECT * FROM music_equipment_inventory;
SELECT equipment_name, brand, quantity FROM music_equipment_inventory WHERE price > 100;
SELECT brand, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM music_equipment_inventory GROUP BY brand;
SELECT id, equipment_name FROM music_equipment_inventory ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM music_equipment_inventory WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM music_equipment_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC, equipment_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT equipment_name, brand, price FROM music_equipment_inventory WHERE brand = 'Fender' AND price < 500 ORDER BY brand ASC
SELECT id, quantity FROM music_equipment_inventory WHERE equipment_name LIKE 'Guitar%' OR equipment_name LIKE '%Amplifier%'
SELECT * FROM music_equipment_inventory WHERE brand IN ('Fender', 'Gibson') ORDER BY brand DESC, price ASC
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, price FROM music_equipment_inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY equipment_name ASC
SELECT * FROM music_equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, price FROM music_equipment WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM music_equipment WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM singing_studios WHERE location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT studio_name, owner FROM singing_studios ORDER BY studio_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM music_equipment WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, price FROM music_equipment WHERE quantity >= 5 AND price <= 500 ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT studio_name, location FROM singing_studios WHERE owner LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT id, equipment_name, quantity FROM music_equipment WHERE price BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM singing_studios WHERE location IN ('New York', 'Los Angeles') ORDER BY studio_name;
SELECT * FROM music_equipment;
SELECT id, name, category FROM music_equipment WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM singing_studios WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT id, name, capacity FROM singing_studios ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT id, name, assigned_date FROM equipment_assignment ORDER BY assigned_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM music_equipment WHERE category = 'Guitar'
SELECT name, quantity FROM music_equipment WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT e.name, s.location FROM music_equipment e JOIN equipment_assignment a ON e.id = a.equipment_id JOIN singing_studios s ON a.studio_id = s.id
SELECT * FROM singing_studios WHERE capacity >= 20 ORDER BY capacity ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT s.location, COUNT(e.id) as total_equipment FROM singing_studios s JOIN equipment_assignment a ON s.id = a.studio_id JOIN music_equipment e ON a.equipment_id = e.id GROUP BY s.location
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT studio_name, location, owner FROM studios ORDER BY owner DESC;
SELECT * FROM instruments WHERE instrument_type='Guitar';
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM equipment WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY equipment_name DESC
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, equipment_type FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY quantity ASC, equipment_name
SELECT studio_id, studio_name, location FROM studios WHERE owner = 'John Doe' OR owner = 'Jane Smith'

SELECT instruments.instrument_id, instruments.instrument_name, studios.studio_name FROM instruments INNER JOIN usage_history ON instruments.instrument_id = usage_history.instrument_id INNER JOIN studios ON usage_history.studio_id = studios.studio_id
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM equipment GROUP BY equipment_id, equipment_name HAVING SUM(quantity) > 50 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, quantity FROM equipment ORDER BY equipment_type DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 5;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, quantity FROM equipment WHERE equipment_type = 'Guitar';
SELECT studio_name, location FROM studio;
SELECT * FROM equipment
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type, quantity FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY equipment_name DESC
SELECT studio_name, location, owner FROM studio ORDER BY location, owner
SELECT instrument_name, brand, price FROM instrument WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM studio_equipment JOIN equipment ON studio_equipment.equipment_id = equipment.equipment_id
